history.proof: induction n. - simpl. qsimpl use: lt_O_fact. - simpl. qsimpl use: lt_O_fact.

exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat IHn : 0 < fact n Unable to unify "1 <= ?M1414 * ?M1415" with "1 <= fact n + n * fact n".

original: induction n. - simpl. apply lt_O_fact. - simpl. apply Nat.mul_pos_pos. + apply Nat.lt_0_succ. + apply lt_O_fact.
